name: Community Environment Day at Shoppers World Danforth
description:
Join Councillor Bradford (Ward 19) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. This event will take place in the vacant parking lot of the closed Lowes store.

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: Spirit Box - The Psychic Experience
description:
Psychic Angel Morgan takes you on a journey through time.

Tradition meets technology, and the choice is yours. What if you could touch the other side? What if you could hear your loved ones one more time? What if there was no wall between the worlds. What if, for just one moment, the other side...was real?

The Spirit Box will open the gates, and open the way, will you cross over?

Using traditional techniques and modern paranormal equipment audiences will not believe their eyes and ears as they hear the voices of the dead.
